post.body: you mean "Baba O'Riley"? You just reminded me to look for it on iTunes and it turns out that the name was different.
Do you have time or are there other papers you need to work on?
@HuskyHiker It would be great to have an iPhone without a camera. I prefer phones without them. I like real cameras.
Lack of photographic evidence of wrongdoing? Or just because there are a lot of really hot people that work there?
that is exactly the pressure here.. combined with coming reorg in January.
I know exactly how you feel... this has been the most stressful december for me ever. I take regular laps in this building.
Santa doesn't even stop at my house... so I'll have to go beat up a few elves to make an exception this year.
That is awesome video. Wish I had a camera nice enough to take decent video.
both @sportsfanjohn & @ricksheibner from fatbloggers.net live up that ways.
I love me some Soup Plantation or Sweet Tomatoes. Great soup for a cold day.
I find myself getting upset at my wife when she makes me late for a morning workout or run. It's easy to be obsessed with it.
this time of year is not a great time for motivation with the weather changing and the holiday stress. Next month may be better
I made it to 50# lost and have struggled since... due to bad food choices and to serious runners leg muscles building up.
that's when I go to "desktop tower defense".
apparently you've never been to a Renaissance festival. Common medieval form of "hurrah".
In Irving here at work :)
It's up now.. it wasn't earlier
you did an awesome job. Wish we lived in Ohio.
The focus is on workouts in general, but a coworker had just pointed out this one today: http://www.gymtechnik.com/
how do you end up getting the calls then?
what kind of call center do you work for? seems like they could start charging him for excessive tech support.
oh, and when you say "uncensored", you may want to change that to "unedited" so that an improper assumption is not made of you
don't worry, that's all I see for now. i could be more picky and review it for spelling/punctuation/grammatical errors.
(just looking at the website from the viewpoint of a new customer).
on the booking page, include a link to one of your flickr photo sets for each type of photoshoot you do. Easy to see examples
also think you need at least one self-portrait on your "about me" page just so that new customers have a way of identifying you
very streamlined. I have an issue though with the title at the top looking line JOSHWHITEIPHOTO (like Whitei) or something)
I'm game
is enjoying a quiet restful Sabbath. So much so that he is going to go bed now. G'night and Yahweh bless you this Sabbath.
generally feels nauseated from his food choices today. No dinner as the thought makes him feel even worse... Never again if I can help it.
went for a run this evening and did a 5K in his fastest time ever (33:51 or 10.89 min/mile). Man, it felt good (http://www.webcudgel.com).
loves the Wii Fit even better. What better way to get a good workout when the weather turns freezing?
covets the Rock Band... but knows he won't play it much alone and wife would not enjoy it at all. It rocks when friends can join in.
is having two very best friends over for lunch and to play Rock Band and possibly some Mario Kart for a few hours. Geek Sunday is the best!
enjoyed a gorgeous morning 5K run just now. If only every day could be like this morning.
is about to prepare his sermon for tomorrow. Thankfully it's a continuation of last time so half the research is done.
is now going to sit down and watch The Green Mile for the first time (yeah, I know, but I'm always behind when it comes to good movies).
came in second place in the HIPPO category. At the cheesecake factory to celebrate.
is hoping everyone has a safe time this night and that he sees you next year.
got in another run this evening. He's really getting into evening runs as they seem to be less troublesome than pre-dawn ones.
